hero.name: rata.
hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: I solve problems with code. Sometimes I create new ones.

about.heading: About
about.description: From logistics systems to browser extensions to stock trading games — I'm the kind of engineer who builds it first, asks questions later. I love TypeScript and work across the full stack: frontend, backend, Electron, you name it. I value shipping over perfection, but I sweat the details where it counts.
